title: VIDEO: A Rat in the Hand is Worth Two on the Tracks
content:
Speaking of Rivendell, if you read the brandâ€™s newsletter, you most likely caught this video Will shot on his 8-mm camera of a ride he and his mates did a little while ago. The name of the video is from an attempt to update old idioms for a more urban lifestyle.
